entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:40 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20 with temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 23.
